title: Pull down screen isn't working well for me, anyway to fix?
content:
I put off system updating for a while and finally did it, and I really dislike the new drag down screen. I liked before where it showed a lot more options, now half the screen is music even if I'm not listening to it. It feels like showing me past songs I was listening to it even random songs, when all I want is to turn on airplane mode, screen cast, flashlight, DnD or whatever else without having to pull down twice, and then start side swiping.

I'm at the gym, and I can't even pause or get to the music track on Newpipe in anyway because when I pull down it shows the song and the app, but clicking it does nothing while before I could pause, rewind, or open the playback all from the pull down screen.

Is there a way to roll back updates, or at least make the pull down screen the way it was before?
